comment.author: 66151649@N02
comment._content: Looks like an old version of the Direct Energy Centre, www.directenergycentre.com/ . Seems that all the old buildings have been torn down...

comment.author: 66151649@N02
comment._content: Manufacturers' Building was a building used to house exhibits of household appliances, fixtures and furnishings. Built in 1902, it burned down on January 3, 1961 and was replaced by the Better Living Centre. per Wikipedia, Manufacturers' Building was a building used to house exhibits of household appliances, fixtures and furnishings. Built in 1902, it burned down on January 3, 1961 and was replaced by the Better Living Centre.
